sentence.Network_en: She is a skeptic about the dangers of global warming.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是全球变暖危险的怀疑论者.

sentence.Network_en: The slender skeptic skips school in slack seasons, which signifies her slackness.
sentence.Network_cn: 一到淡季那个苗条的怀疑者就逃学, 这表现了她的懒散.

sentence.Network_en: I agree with the skeptic at this point : the change of calendar is an arbitrary conventionalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 我和 无神论 者们一样,认为更换日历是一种专制的传统.

《单词背上瘾》 ... be skeptical of sth. 对.....表示怀疑 skeptic:n. (怀疑论者) a group of nowhere actors 一群不知名的演员.
寄托蓝宝书速记版 ... sip vt. 啜饮 skeptic n. 怀疑者,怀疑论者,无神论者 skimp v. 节省花费,吝啬.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who habitually doubts accepted beliefs

sentences.en: Events since the elections have proved the skeptics right.
sentences.cn: 选举后的一系列事件证明怀疑派是正确的。
